                          org.lukep.javavis.visualisation.views.TreeMapView.BorderColorAction
Enclosing class:
TreeMapView
public static class TreeMapView.BorderColorAction
extends prefuse.action.assignment.ColorAction

Set the stroke color for drawing treemap node outlines. A graded grayscale ramp is used, with higer nodes in the tree drawn in lighter shades of gray.
